originalText.text: April is such an amazing healer. She’s curious and genuine. You feel comfortable immediately as well as safe and taken care of. She is skilled and very professional. I’ve been seeing her for the past two months and have experienced a vast improvement. Can’t recommend enough.

text.text: April is such an amazing healer. She’s curious and genuine. You feel comfortable immediately as well as safe and taken care of. She is skilled and very professional. I’ve been seeing her for the past two months and have experienced a vast improvement. Can’t recommend enough.

originalText.text:
I am lucky to have been seeing April, the founder of Sunny Side: Acupuncture and Healing Arts, for around a year now. She is an incredible acupuncturist and healer who was has helped me extensively.

I am a tap dancer and went to her with a very sprained ankle. With her combination of knowledge on both healing and tap dance, she was able to understand my injury in a unique and effective way. Before I saw her I was in a lot of pain and unable to fully rotate my ankle. She relieved nearly all of my pain and gave me more mobility, allowing me to work on strengthening exercises and function on a day to day basis. Since I have been seeing her my healing process had quickened. Before April, I was also seeing a physical therapist and different acupuncturist. April was able to relieve my pain and discomfort in a way neither of them could. She has changed my life and I am beyond grateful to be able to know and be treated by her.

originalText.text: April is a superstar Acupuncturist. We handled the back pain first in less than a month. Gone. Then we talked about simple lifestyle stuff to stay ahead of it. She's a cool cat to boot. Thanks April!

originalText.text: I Never write reviews period. But April is top notch as a professional and as person. Could get into the nitty gritty of why and how she’s so great at her job but that’s it from me.
